answers.answer: Yes, the basic dental medicine package includes various treatments such as consultation, treatment for simple caries, care for oral mucosa conditions, dental extractions, alveolar curettage, handling of bleeding, decapsulation, provision of removable acrylic prostheses on the arch, physiognomic or semi-physiognomic prosthetic elements, and devices utilized in treating congenital malformations.

answers.answer: Yes, young people who are between 18 and 26 years old and are either students (including high school graduates), apprentices, or students who don't earn any income can participate. answers.answer: Yes, there are age restrictions for joining this program. It is only available for young people between 18 and 26 years old who are students, including high school graduates, as long as they are enrolled in an academic course during the upcoming academic year. However, they cannot have any earnings from their job. In such cases, the health insurance company will cover 100% of the dental service-related fees.
